inclusion.criterion: A diagnosis of GD based on standard clinical criteria (elevated thyroid hormone levels, suppressed TSH, positive TSHR auto-antibody, diffuse goiter ± high RAI uptake).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Aged between 18 and 70 years old at the time of informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have had at least one GD relapse. A relapse is defined as recurrent or persistent hyperthyroidism despite completing a continued course of ATDs for 18 months or more.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prefer or have clear indications for surgery (such as those with large compressive goiter, suspected or documented thyroid malignancy, wishing to become pregnant within 6 months or with moderate to severe GO).
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and is experiencing worsening dysphagia, poor oral intake, weight loss, and lethargy.
